roleset.name: cause to be nervous, discombobulated
roleset.note: FLUSTER-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from fluster.01-v)
FLUSTERED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from flustered.01-j)

example.name: very sweet..
example.text: We-1 blushed and were flustered [*-1] , and it turned out [*-2]to be the fleetest brush of lips upon cheek .

example.name: 'with' arg0
example.text: I was so flustered with her I left only 20 minutes before dinner service and missed out on beef and lamb kabob
example.arg: [so][I left only 20 minutes before dinner service and missed out on beef and lamb kabob]
